titleStmt.title: The Two unfortunate lovers. Or, A true relation of the lamentable end of John True and Susan Mease. Their lives this ditty doth relate. And how they dy'd unfortunate. The tune is, The brides burial.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
